column2: 3. Perform basic preventive maintenance servicing for Backhoe Loader
column3: 3.1 Identify minor and major defects 3.2 Identify and explain the use of basic hand tools and consumables 3.3 Use basic hand tools in servicing minor defects and os parts 3.4 Prepare equipment report 3.5 Perform good housekeeping
column5: Observation Demonstration with oral questioning Written test
